articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: AMD’s AI-powered FSR 4 upscaling is now available in most FSR 3.1 games - The Verge
articles.description: AMD’s FSR 4 AI upscaling tech can now be enabled for most games that support FSR 3.1 thanks to the latest driver.
articles.content: FSR 4 is also now officially supported in more than 85 games. FSR 4 is also now officially supported in more than 85 games. by Jay PetersClose Jay Peters Po… [+2370 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: Nobel laureate David Baltimore dead at 87 - Ars Technica
articles.description: Celebrated molecular biologist weathered late ’80s controversy to become Caltech president.
